title: Full Stack Developer
description: We are hiring a junior developer with experience in React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. The role includes API development, UI work, and Git-based collaboration.

title: Frontend Engineer
description: Seeking a frontend engineer skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Responsibilities include building responsive UIs and collaborating with designers.

title: Backend Developer
description: Looking for a backend developer with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL experience. You will design APIs and manage databases.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our team to automate deployments and manage cloud infrastructure using Docker, AWS, and CI/CD tools.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We need a creative UI/UX designer proficient in Figma, Adobe XD, and modern UI/UX practices to design user-centric web and mobile interfaces. Experience with wireframing, prototyping, user flows, mockups, design systems, usability testing, and responsive design is a plus.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Hiring a mobile developer with React Native and TypeScript experience to build cross-platform apps.

title: QA Engineer
description: Seeking a QA engineer to write and execute test cases using Jest and Cypress. Experience with automation is a plus.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze business data using SQL, Python, and BI tools. Build dashboards, generate reports, and provide actionable insights for business decisions. Experience with analytics, data visualization, Tableau, Power BI, and reporting is required.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop ML models using Python, TensorFlow, and scikit-learn. Deploy models to production environments.

title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description: Design scalable cloud solutions on AWS and Azure. Experience with Kubernetes is required.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product development cycles, define requirements, and coordinate with engineering and design teams.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor and secure systems using SIEM tools, perform vulnerability assessments, and respond to incidents.

title: Database Administrator
description: Manage and optimize MySQL and MongoDB databases. Ensure data integrity and backup procedures.

title: Technical Writer
description: Create technical documentation, API guides, and user manuals for software products.

title: Business Analyst
description: Gather and document requirements, analyze business processes, and deliver insights using tools like SQL, Excel, and BI platforms. Experience with analytics, reporting, dashboards, and stakeholder communication is essential.

title: Network Engineer
description: Design and maintain network infrastructure, troubleshoot connectivity issues, and implement security protocols.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Assist in building web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Great for students and freshers.

title: AI Researcher
description: Conduct research in AI, publish papers, and prototype new algorithms using Python and PyTorch.

title: Salesforce Developer
description: Develop and customize Salesforce applications, automate workflows, and integrate third-party APIs.

title: Support Engineer
description: Provide technical support, troubleshoot issues, and assist customers via email and chat.
